context: Nonprofit organization seeking funding for comprehensive digital transformation to improve operational efficiency

request.purpose: Digital transformation including CRM, program management software, and data analytics platform
request.justification: Modernize operations to better serve beneficiaries and increase fundraising efficiency

decision_process.outcome: Technology solution selected with nonprofit pricing

business_impact.expected_outcome: 50% improvement in operational efficiency, enhanced beneficiary services, increased fundraising capacity
